description: Allows mob to move towards a certain block.
title: Move To Block

speed_multiplier.title: Speed Multiplier
speed_multiplier.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal.

tick_interval.title: Tick Interval
tick_interval.description: Average interval in ticks to try to run this behavior.

start_chance.title: Start Chance
start_chance.description: Chance to start the behavior (applied after each random tick_interval).

search_range.title: Search Range
search_range.description: The height in blocks that the mob will look for the block.

search_height.title: Search Height
search_height.description: The height in blocks that the mob will look for the block.

goal_radius.title: Goal Radius
goal_radius.description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the 'wiggle room' to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot.

stay_duration.title: Stay Duration
stay_duration.description: Number of ticks needed to complete a stay at the block.

target_selection_method.title: Target Selection Method
target_selection_method.description: Kind of block to find fitting the specification.

target_offset.title: Target Offset
target_offset.description: Offset to add to the selected target position.

on_stay_completed.title: Event: On Stay Completed
on_stay_completed.description: Event to run on block reached.

on_reach.title: Event: On Reach
on_reach.description: Event to run on block reached.
